headline: The J.M. Smucker Co. Completes the Divestiture of Certain Value Brands to JTM Foods, LLC
summary: The J.M. Smucker Co. (NYSE: SJM) ("Company") announced today the closing of the transaction to divest its Cloverhill and Big Texas brands, as well as certain private label products, to JTM Foods, LLC ("JTM"). The Company previously announced the signing of a definitive agreement for the transaction on January 31, 2025. The all-cash transaction is valued at approximately $40 million, subject to a working capital adjustment, and includes relevant trademarks and licenses as well as the Company's ma

headline: Sweet snacks impairments push JM Smucker into red
summary: The US manufacturer also saw “supply-chain disruptions” in its pet-food business weigh on sales.
